lemma cer:
assumes  "r \<in> {e,m,b,ov,s,f,d,m^-1,b^-1,ov^-1,s^-1,f^-1,d^-1}" 
shows "e O r = r"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. e O r = r
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. e O r = r

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. e O r = r
fix x y

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. e O r = r
assume a:"(x,y) \<in> e O r"

proof (state)
this:
  (x, y) \<in> e O r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. e O r = r
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (x, y) \<in> e O r
obtain z where "(x,z) \<in> e" and "(z,y) \<in> r"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (x, y) \<in> e O r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>z.
        \<lbrakk>(x, z) \<in> e; (z, y) \<in> r\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  (x, z) \<in> e
  (z, y) \<in> r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. e O r = r
from \<open>(x,z) \<in> e\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (x, z) \<in> e
have "x = z"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (x, z) \<in> e

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x = z
using e

proof (prove)
using this:
  (x, z) \<in> e
  ((?p, ?q) \<in> e) = (?p = ?q)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x = z
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  x = z

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. e O r = r
with \<open>(z,y)\<in> r\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (z, y) \<in> r
  x = z
have "(x,y) \<in> r"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (z, y) \<in> r
  x = z

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (x, y) \<in> r
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  (x, y) \<in> r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. e O r = r

proof (state)
this:
  (?x2, ?y2) \<in> e O r \<Longrightarrow> (?x2, ?y2) \<in> r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. e O r = r
note c1 = this

proof (state)
this:
  (?x2, ?y2) \<in> e O r \<Longrightarrow> (?x2, ?y2) \<in> r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. e O r = r

proof (state)
this:
  (?x2, ?y2) \<in> e O r \<Longrightarrow> (?x2, ?y2) \<in> r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. e O r = r
fix x y

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. e O r = r
assume a:"(x,y) \<in>  r"

proof (state)
this:
  (x, y) \<in> r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. e O r = r
have "(x,x) \<in> e"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (x, x) \<in> e
using e

proof (prove)
using this:
  ((?p, ?q) \<in> e) = (?p = ?q)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (x, x) \<in> e
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  (x, x) \<in> e

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. e O r = r
with a

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (x, y) \<in> r
  (x, x) \<in> e
have "(x,y) \<in> e O r"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (x, y) \<in> r
  (x, x) \<in> e

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (x, y) \<in> e O r
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  (x, y) \<in> e O r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. e O r = r

proof (state)
this:
  (?x2, ?y2) \<in> r \<Longrightarrow> (?x2, ?y2) \<in> e O r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. e O r = r
note c2 = this

proof (state)
this:
  (?x2, ?y2) \<in> r \<Longrightarrow> (?x2, ?y2) \<in> e O r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. e O r = r
from c1 c2

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (?x2, ?y2) \<in> e O r \<Longrightarrow> (?x2, ?y2) \<in> r
  (?x2, ?y2) \<in> r \<Longrightarrow> (?x2, ?y2) \<in> e O r
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  (?x2, ?y2) \<in> e O r \<Longrightarrow> (?x2, ?y2) \<in> r
  (?x2, ?y2) \<in> r \<Longrightarrow> (?x2, ?y2) \<in> e O r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. e O r = r
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  e O r = r

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

(* composition with single relation *)
subsection \<open>r-composition\<close>
text \<open>We prove compositions of the form $r_1 \circ r_2 \subseteq r$, where $r$ is a basic relation.\<close>
method (in arelations) r_compose uses r1 r2 r3 = ((auto, (subst (asm) r1 ), (subst (asm) r2), (subst r3)) ,  (meson M5exist_var))
lemma (in arelations) cbb:"b O b \<subseteq> b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b O b \<subseteq> b
by (r_compose r1:b r2:b r3:b)
lemma  (in arelations)  cbm:"b O m \<subseteq> b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b O m \<subseteq> b
by (r_compose r1:b r2:m r3:b)
lemma cbov:"b O ov \<subseteq> b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b O ov \<subseteq> b
apply (auto simp:b ov)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y z t k l u v ta.
       \<lbrakk>x \<parallel> t; t \<parallel> y; k \<parallel> y;
        y \<parallel> u; u \<parallel> v; k \<parallel> l; l \<parallel> z;
        z \<parallel> v; l \<parallel> ta; ta \<parallel> u\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>t. x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> z
using M1 M5exist_var

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?p \<parallel> ?q; ?p \<parallel> ?s; ?r \<parallel> ?q\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?r \<parallel> ?s
  \<lbrakk>?x \<parallel> ?y; ?y \<parallel> ?z; ?z \<parallel> ?w\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>t. ?x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> ?w

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y z t k l u v ta.
       \<lbrakk>x \<parallel> t; t \<parallel> y; k \<parallel> y;
        y \<parallel> u; u \<parallel> v; k \<parallel> l; l \<parallel> z;
        z \<parallel> v; l \<parallel> ta; ta \<parallel> u\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>t. x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> z
by blast
lemma cbfi:"b O f^-1 \<subseteq> b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b O f\<inverse> \<subseteq> b
apply (auto simp:b f)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y z t k l u.
       \<lbrakk>x \<parallel> t; t \<parallel> y; k \<parallel> l;
        l \<parallel> z; z \<parallel> u; k \<parallel> y;
        y \<parallel> u\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>t. x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> z
by (meson M1 M5exist_var)
lemma cbdi:"b O d^-1 \<subseteq> b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b O d\<inverse> \<subseteq> b
apply (auto simp: b d)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y z t k l u v.
       \<lbrakk>x \<parallel> t; t \<parallel> y; k \<parallel> l;
        l \<parallel> z; z \<parallel> u; u \<parallel> v; k \<parallel> y;
        y \<parallel> v\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>t. x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> z
by (meson M1 M5exist_var)
lemma cbs:"b O s \<subseteq> b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b O s \<subseteq> b
apply (auto simp: b s)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y z t k u v.
       \<lbrakk>x \<parallel> t; t \<parallel> y; k \<parallel> y;
        y \<parallel> u; u \<parallel> v; k \<parallel> z;
        z \<parallel> v\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>t. x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> z

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b O s\<inverse> \<subseteq> b
apply (auto simp: b s)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y z t k u v.
       \<lbrakk>x \<parallel> t; t \<parallel> y; k \<parallel> z;
        z \<parallel> u; u \<parallel> v; k \<parallel> y;
        y \<parallel> v\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>t. x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> z
by (meson M1 M5exist_var)
lemma (in arelations) cmb:"m O b \<subseteq> b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. m O b \<subseteq> b
by (r_compose r1:m r2:b r3:b)

lemma cmov:"m O ov \<subseteq> b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. m O ov \<subseteq> b
apply (auto simp:b m ov)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y z k l u v t.
       \<lbrakk>x \<parallel> y; k \<parallel> y; y \<parallel> u;
        u \<parallel> v; k \<parallel> l; l \<parallel> z; z \<parallel> v;
        l \<parallel> t; t \<parallel> u\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>t. x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> z
using M1 M5exist_var
